title: Ascension Gone Early?
body: Riot said it would leave around 1-3 am, but it's 9 here on the west/best coast and its gone :(

replies.body: I was looking forward to playing tonight and it's gone early, very sad, Ascension's my favorite alternate game mode. :(
Happened to me too, but then it came back up again about 30 minutes ago for me

between 1am and 3am.  removed at 9pm?  rito what?

is this by useast or west time... since usually riot goes by uswest.  really odd.

yeah, confused as well
-goes back to aram
